metadata.title: Working through the COVID-19 outbreak: Rapid review and recommendations for MSK and allied heath personnel

abstract.original_text: The coronavirus pandemic has caused the world to undergo unprecedented change in a short space of time. This disease has devastated the economy, infringed personal freedom, and has taken a toll on healthcare systems worldwide. This review aims to highlight aspects of this pandemic with a specific emphasis on musculoskeletal work within the secondary care setting.

sentences.segment_text: The coronavirus pandemic has caused the world to undergo unprecedented change in a short space of time .
This disease has devastated the economy ,
infringed personal freedom , and has taken a toll on healthcare systems worldwide .
This review aims to highlight aspects of this pandemic with a specific emphasis on musculoskeletal work within the secondary care setting .
